column4: i've accidentally removed the top panel on my second display.  I've tried running gnome-panel but it doesn't bring it back.  In gconf-editor apps/panel/toplevels there seems to be a missing top_panel_screen1.  How do i add that back in there
right click on the bottom panel, then choose new panel
then right click on the empty new panel, then add to panel,. then choose the things that were there originally
